content.text: Andinri was a gas giant in the Caridan system, a star system in the Colonies region of the galaxy. Andinri was the sixth and farthest planet in the system from the star Caridan, and Andinri was orbited by twenty moons.

Andinri was first mentioned in Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 1: Weight Training, the first in the Carida: Heavy Duty series of web articles released on Wizards.com that detailed the planet Carida. The article was written by Cory J. Herndon and published on September 4, 2003.

elements.text: Carida: Heavy Duty, Part 1: Weight Training on Wizards.com
